views.markdown:
Compatible with iOS 11, 12 and 13

Cthulhu Gives the Opportunity to Custom Select the Texts below the Press Home to Open and Swipe up to Unlock!

The Tweak also Provides other options for the LockScreen Features to Better Fit the Tweak Custom Texts like making Transparent the Quick Actions Buttons, hiding the Press Home to Open and Swipe up to Unlock Labels and the Home Bottom Bar on iPhone X!

Cthulhu is the be semi-divine of prodigious proportions and strength that resides in the lost submerged city of R'lyeh on Lovecraft Novels!

The Tweak so Enables the Apple Legal Text and Internal Contact Information as on Internal Development Devices, that are useful also when the iPhone is being locked on LS! (Thanks a lot sinfool by the Nice Flex Community for this kind of explanation and Methodology).

Credits are inside Prefs.

See Screenshots below.

Respring is Needed to Apply any Changes only if Necessary for refreshing Preferences, the Respring Button is so bundled in!

Configure options from Settings.

Feel free to contact me via Mail or via Twitter @CydiaGeek, enjoy it, thanks! :)

would be greatly appreciated!

Version 1.0.5 - Updated for iOS 13 Full Compatibility. - Improvements. Version 1.0.3
- As Requested, Added the option to Select Custom Swipe up to Open Text on LockScreen (thanks sinfool Patch, iOS 12 Tested).

Version 1.0.2
- Fixed the option to Hide the Press Home not Working on Some Devices (Reported on Mail).


Version 1.0.1
- Added the option to Hide the TOP Press Home/Swipe up to Unlock and Open Label on iOS 12 (Requested on Twitter).
